column4: I have a problem with aMule: when loading the program for the first time, it doesn't detect any servers and when I try to press the button that's supposed to load a list of servers from somewhere, it crashes. Any ideas?
maybe another program I can use?
Why does this error occur? I tried installing the program twice and it's the same thing each time
well that's good because reinstalling things never fixes anything in linux ;)
